# Data Source: proxmox_virtual_environment_sdn_fabric_ospf

OSPF Fabric in Proxmox SDN. Fabrics in Proxmox VE SDN provide automated routing between nodes in a cluster.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "proxmox_virtual_environment_sdn_fabric_ospf" "main" {
  id = "main-fabric"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the SDN fabric.

### Read-Only

- `area` (String) OSPF area. Either a IPv4 address or a 32-bit number. Gets validated in rust.
- `ip_prefix` (String) IPv4 prefix cidr for the fabric.
